keyToStrMap.1: She maintains the bridges that between our town and other towns.
keyToStrMap.2: The bridges are made out of word matter. And you know word matter is unstable.
keyToStrMap.3: Unfortunately this means that the bridges collapse a lot.
keyToStrMap.4: She knows how to fix the bridges, but she's not very good at telling which parts of the bridge might collapse
keyToStrMap.5: She has heard from the other townspeople that I might have the skills for the job.

keyToStrMap.Full:
Ella the Engineer

Occupation:
[] Engineer (previously worked as an architect)

Likes:
[] Singing, going for walks at night

Dislikes:
[] Scary movies, storms

Favourite quote:
[] Never wear your best trousers when you go out to fight for freedom and truth.

Favourite people in the (living) world:
[] My sister

How I came to be here:
[] Very poor health.

What I wish:
[] To go dancing with my sister
